doc.para: This demonstration document does not use a XXE configuration to specify its style sheet. Instead, it directly references form-sampler.css using a <?xml-stylesheet?> processing instruction. Therefore if you want to see this document properly styled, do not turn on option "Ignore <?xml-stylesheet?>" (Options|Preferences, Open section).
